transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji. 
Customer: Haan ji sir abhi voice cut gayi sir main drive bhi kar raha tha isliye maine call back nahi kiya aapko.
Executive: Na na na abhi kar lijiye sir mere ko wapas aap din mein call karenge main frustrated rehta aur reply nahi de paunga bataye aap.
Customer: Haan mujhe malum hai sir pata hai mujhe kya hota hai na abhi aapne usse call pe na feedback diya hoga Vanshika theek hai jaise Vanshika ki baat hui hogi to ek feedback jata hai aapko to wo aapne not satisfied mark kar diya hoga jo bhi aap.
Customer: Sir to main satisfied hui nahi main personal unse nahi main India mart se hi satisfied nahi hoon aap logon ne humse paisa lete waqt jo model humko set karke diya aapka mail aata hai ki 10 lead aapko allocate kar diya hai theek hai aur main turant jata hoon aapke application open karta hoon aur waha pe aayi hui rehti hai do ya teen lead to aap mail mein kya show karna chahte hain ki aapne aapka kaam kar diya hai jabki mere ko agar actual dekhne jao to lead aayi hui rehti hai do ya teen aur usme bhi koi kaam ke liye cheez nahi hai kyu main fir mera time waste karu sir ab main paise deke bewakoof to ban gaya.
Executive: Nahi sir dekho aisa nahi hai aap paise deke bewakoof nahi bane baat itni si hai sir aapka jo product line hai jis mein jo aapki expectation hai sir wo sach mein bahut hai high lekin hum usko puri mane bhi.
Customer: Sir main manufacturer agar hoon to main kisi ko do do piece bechte rahunga kya jab aap hamare expectation to humne aapne jab humse paisa liya uske pehle hi aapko bataye the na.
Executive: Thank you aap Aurangabad se aap Delhi travel karte ho aate ho aapke kitne sare yaha pe Delhi mein aake deals aap final karte ho khud se aake final karke jate ho aapko pata hai ye mujhe pata hai.
Customer: Sir dekhiye aapke alawa sir main abhi itna 70 80 crore rupay laga ke jo setup laga ke baitha hoon us setup mein main aapke bharose to nahi baitha hoon na sir mere bhi per day customers close ho rahe hain na sir aapke end se kuch nahi ho raha hai mere ko ye aapko samjhana hai mujhe bas itna paisa mere ko ye samjhana hai ek basic facebook add market place mein dalne ke baad mein jo mere ko leads aa rahi hai free wali wo mere ko paisa kharcha karke bhi aap nahi de pa rahe ho aur aaltu faltu lead aa rahi hai jisko mere ko jawab dena mushkil ho ja raha hai kya karenge sir lead mein problem aa rahi hai ya sirf har ek usme aa raha hai sir aapko jaise agar main.
Customer: Sir aapke end se jo lead aa rahi hai na aap ek bar profile open kijiye na mera aapke end se jo leads aa rahi hai usme most of konsi lead hai aap check kijiye acha maine galti se ek din usme search kar liya tha mere ko mere product ke liye complimentary dene ke liye perfume chahiye tha to sir mera to kaam hi hat gaya perfume wale ke roj ke 50 100 call aane chalu ho gaye matlab main to mera kaam pados mein hi reh gaya ab dusre hi kaam shuru ho gaye abhi tak bhi logo ke message aur call aa rahe hain.
Executive: ID se check kar rahe hain sir usi ID se kar liya na kya.
Customer: Sir ab mere pass ID ek hi hai na.
Executive: Haan to aapne na jaise kya ho na supplier tool se aapne requirement bhej di hogi to unhone kya socha hoga ki aap as a businessman ho.
Customer: Main aapki baat samajh raha hoon to mujhe main aggressive isiliye hoon ki meri ek inquiry pe mujhe agle char din tak 100 logon ke call aa rahe hain jo meri perfect inquiry thi usi ke bare mein to jo mujhe perfect product sell karna hai uske bare mein aapke end se inquiry aa hi nahi rahi hai na jab main mere isme de chuka hoon ki mera product domestic hai mere ko commercial ki inquiry aa rahi hai mera product table top nahi hai table top ki inquiry aa rahi hai main bulk quantity ke alawa deal nahi karunga mujhe ek ek piece ke liye call aa raha hai sir main kaise karunga acha uske end mein koi achi lead bhi aati hongi main aisa nahi bol raha hoon ki aapke end se jo lead aa rahi hai wo sabhi failure hogi lekin 10 lead mein 20 lead mein agar koi ek lead aap se achi aa rahi hogi main kaise justify karu ki wo lead aapki achi hai main dhyan hi nahi de raha hoon aapke mails aa rahe hain ki 10 lead aapko allocate kar di mail aane pe main wo check kar raha hoon waha ja ke dekh raha hoon to do ya teen hi lead hai to aap log 10 lead ka mail kaise kar dete ho un officially.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo sir 10 lead is a credit lead hai aap samajh rahiye jo aapko 10 lead jati hai na wo har saturday night ko aapko ek mail aata hoga ya sunday ko raat mein ki aapko 10 lead credit hui hai yani ki ek week ke andar mein 10 plus ek daily bonus 17 buyers se aap connect kar sakte ho wo uska mail aata hai aapko.
Customer: Lead allocation to alag cheez hai sir matlab wo aapko credit balance deta hai India mart.
Executive: Acha aapne credit balance de diya ab hum use kab karenge sir usko jab usme lead aayegi tab na ki main search karte rahunga initially sir meri aapki lead hi nahi aa rahi na sir pure hafte mein nahi aa rahi na ab aa jati sirf aapka target pura kar rahe ho aap wo 10 lead puri karni hai iske liye aap koi bhi 10 lead dal de rahe ho mere isme koi bhi number pure kar rahe ho kam kar rahe ho leta hoon ek bar main ye check kar lunga abhi aap pe ki at least agar aap mere ko main hi khud se Vansh ke sath baith ke review kar lunga actual sir aap samajh lo main aapko last time bhi samjha chuka hoon agar aaj pichle do mahine mein jab se main aapka app use kar raha hoon kareeb kareeb dedh mahine do mahine hone aaye ji bilkul agar aapko mera business model hi nahi pata hai to aap mere ko leads kaha se allocate kar denge acha maine mera business model samjhane ke baad aap logon ne hi mujhe bola ki aap laptop mein login kijiye maine laptop mein login kiya fir aapke bande ne hi mujhe bataya ki aap aisa aisa kijiye maine waisa sab kiya sir aap wo aa hi nahi rahe aur mere pass itna time nahi sir main aapko follow up leke haan main samajh gaya sir leads ki baat thoda sa aapko leads pe chalo theek hai issue agar aa raha hai to main leads ka to main dekh lunga mujhe bas yehi bata dijiye sir baki ke do sources mere pass aur bhi hai samne se calls bhi aapko aa rahi hai ek do call jo bhi aa rahi hai aur plus inquiry wo bhi call nahi aa rahi sir mere ko samne se ikka dukka call aate hain haan wahi bhi koi agar basic rahega to main usko nahi bol deta hoon aur koi bada rahega to main usko jawab bolta hoon abhi tak koi bada mujhe kya lag raha hai malum hai kya log time pass karne ke liye India mart pe aate hain mujhe ye lag raha hai abhi wo sirf market tatolne ke liye aate hain wo lead nahi aati sir aapke bilkul sahi keh rahe hain sir bahut jyada aisa mujhe lagne laga hai abhi nahi bahut jyada agar bulk mein koi requirement agar le raha hai aap se to wo bas price teen char jagah teen char jagah se requirement nahi sir mere pass 30 30000 piece chalne wale bhi client hai maine requirement kya show kari sir main minimum container ke niche kaam nahi karunga mere ko 250 piece plus bhi wala lekin aap 30 piece hai mere pass do piece ki char piece ki aap log usko kuch control kiye na wo bhi control nahi karunga kya to wo main aapka filter set karwa deta hoon sir aap usi filter pe kaam kariye agar us filter pe aapko lead show karegi to ab ab ab mera ye sab detail aapne lene ke baad agar mere pass dusra kuch aayega hi nahi iska to matlab maine 30 40 hazar waste kiye na sir nahi sir hum aapka 30 40 hazar waste nahi hum aapka bas inquiry ka flow jate aur jyada badhiya main to main to ek hi manunga sir pure season mein agar aapke end se ek client bhi aa gaya mere 40 hazar worth nahi hai aapke end se koi client hi nahi hai aayega sir aap iske liye aapke 10 lead pure karne ke piche nahi nahi sir wo 10 lead maine to jab aapki initial onboarding hui thi theek hai us time pe bhi shayad aapke account manager ye discussion hua tha to us time pe bhi yahi baat hui thi sir mahine ki ek do lead bhi agar aapko milti hai bulk mein matlab bas mil jaye main kya bol raha hoon main kya bol raha hoon sir main to bol raha hoon pure season ki ek lead par mujhe aasar nazar nahi aa rahi ki aap pure season mein aasar ki baat nahi sir aasar mujhe jo dikh raha hai sir isse bhi mujhe inquiry aapki badi dikh rahi hai lead ka thoda sa problem mujhe dikh raha hai yaha pe lekin samne se jo customer aapko message kar raha hai yani deliver kar raha hai jo lead user se business nahi karna hai main b2b portal pe kaam karta hoon sir main b2c kar hi nahi raha hoon na to mere pass b2c ki inquiry aana hi nahi chahiye jyada jyada aa rahi hai sir to wo wo main aapko jyada nahi sir almost wahi hai almost wahi hai jyada nahi aa rahi sir almost wahi aa rahi hai yani ki ab tak aapko koi aisi bulk deal mili nahi sir India se matlab khushi se baat koi nahi sir single nahi sir aap agar kal mere ko din mein call kijiye aap 10 minute lunga main main aapko analyse karke bataunga ki without kharche wali main ek basic facebook pe add choda usse mere kitne customer close hue wo bhi bata dunga aur paisa kharcha karke India mart se comparison de dunga ki aapke ek ka kaam nahi hua jabki aap logon ki call jyada mere ko attend karne par dhanda winda to kuch ho raha nahi bas apan discussion mein reh ja rahe hain samajh gaya sir main aap mere ko kal ka koi time bataye sir main us time pe aapko connect kar leta hoon ek bar sir aap mere ko subah 10:30 se 11:30 ke beech mein lagaiye done sir main laga main aapko bata dunga chaliye
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with lead quality and quantity.

- Feels misled about the number of leads.

- Receiving irrelevant inquiries (B2C instead of B2B).

- Time is being wasted on low-quality leads.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive will review the lead quality.

- Executive offered to set up filters.

- Executive will discuss with Vanshika.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, b2b, b2c, filters
